General.Name: Blockchain Group SA
General.Description: The Blockchain Group, together with its subsidiaries, develops and markets blockchain technologies in France and internationally. It also engages in the integration of blockchain technologies; and IT and marketing consulting activities. In addition, the company is involved in professional training support and consulting; and digital marketing activity for the operation of the Shopbot platform. Further, it offers ESM consulting activity in IT, for data science. The Blockchain Group was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Puteaux, France.

9.Name: Lionel  Rigaud
9.Title: Chief Data Officer & MD of Trimane
